message:
誰有興趣講幾分鐘您的「跨性別在科技」經驗？

我加了個 2018/7/28 10:00 「跨性別在科技」議題在
https://wiki.debconf.org/wiki/DebConf18/OpenDay
您願意來新竹發表嗎？(English) 還有推薦誰？
是 https://debconf18.debconf.org/ 研討會開幕日。
story: Dan Jacobson shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Debian Open Day, Saturday, July 28, 2018, not only intends to show Debian to the local community, but also wants to learn from local community. Therefore Debian Day aims to realise social and FOSS related activities (not so much technical stuff).
name: DebConf18/OpenDay - Wiki
caption: wiki.debconf.org
